name: DesertShootout
description:
GamePlay: A town in the desert filled with bad guys. Buy some guns and take them out.

Features:

• Town: A town in the middle of the desert.

• KillCount: Keeps track of all the enemies killed.

• Cash: Kill enemies for cash.

• Enemies: Lots of enemies in town to kill.

• Time: Keeps track of playtime.

• Guns: Use cash to buy guns, your need lots of guns!

• Hardcore: DesertShootout is a is a hardcore fps. No save/lord, no health bar.
